prompt.preamble:
We are testing a system for understanding people's interest in reading different kinds of online articles.
For example, you might be interested in articles about some topics, but not about others.
prompt.task_description: your preferences of what kinds of online articles you would like to read
prompt.final: In the final part of the study, you will give feedback on a test set of article headline and descriptions, which will enable us to see how well a chatbot reading your responses has learned what you like and dislike.
prompt.evaluation: Please indicate whether you would like to read the following articles: "yes" if you would, "no" if you would not.

conversation_history.message:
Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: AncientHistoryDigest
Title: Rethinking the Fall of the Roman Empire: A Socioeconomic Perspective
Description: Delve into a fresh viewpoint of the fall of the Roman Empire, elucidating the role of socioeconomic factors. This article offers an in-depth analysis of historical data and archaeology to challenge traditional narratives.
Yes I would be very interested in learning more about that.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: CulinaryWorld
Title: The Science Behind Fermentation: A Deep Dive into Traditional Food Preservation Techniques
Description: Explore the magic and science of fermentation in this detailed article. Learn about its history, cultural significance, and the role it plays in enhancing flavors and nutritional value of food. From Sauerkraut in Germany to Kimchi in Korea, discover how fermentation shapes cuisines around the world.
No I would not like to see that today/

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: QuantumChronicles
Title: Quantum Computing 101: The Dawn of a New Era
Description: Unravel the mysteries of quantum computing in this beginner-friendly guide. Understand its potential implications on cryptography, artificial intelligence, and the very fabric of our understanding of the universe, with insights from leading scientists in the field.
Yes I would like to see that.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: PopBios
Title: The Untold Story of Pop Artists: A Deep Dive into Their Personal Lives and Inspirations
Description: This article peels back the curtain on the personal lives of famous pop artists, discussing their muses, inspirations, and struggles. Understand the creative process and the real-life experiences that have shaped the music and style of your favorite artists. Also, explore how pop culture and societal trends have influenced their careers.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: CryptoCurrencyCorner
Title: NFTs in the Mainstream: The Art of Digital Ownership
Description: Dive headfirst into the world of non-fungible tokens (NFTs), the digital assets that are driving a new wave of art collectors. This article discusses how NFTs work, their impact on the art industry, and the controversies surrounding them. We will also explore some notable NFT sales, and how they've redefined the concept of ownership in the digital space.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: Earthwise
Title: Climate Change and Mental Health: An Unexplored Connection
Description: This article delves into the lesser-discussed implications of climate change on mental health. Learn how climatic shifts can influence stress levels, anxiety, and overall mental wellness. Using robust scientific studies and expert opinions, the article unravels the intricate interplay between environmental changes and human psychology.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: IntergalacticEncyclopedia
Title: Extraterrestrial Life and Its Possibilities: A Cosmic Enquiry
Description: Venture into the enigmatic cosmos as we investigate the possibilities of life outside Earth. This comprehensive piece delves into the latest advancements in astrobiology, space explorations, and the Drake Equation. Read about the tantalizing discoveries of exoplanets, extremophiles, and the implications for our understanding of life's uniqueness and commonality in the universe.

query_prompt.content:
Your task is to learn what topics a user is interested in reading online article about. People's interests are broad, so you should seek to understand their interests across many topics; in other words, go for breadth rather than depth. Do not assume a user has given a complete answer to any question, so make sure to keep probing different types of interests.

Come up with a potential edge case to learn as much information as you can about what their desired behavior should be under different circumstances.
Make sure the edge case addresses different aspects of the system than the edge cases that have already been considered.

An example edge case is: Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: TechTalkDaily
Title: 10 Must-Have Gadgets for 2023: A Comprehensive Guide
Description: Discover the top 10 gadgets that will revolutionize your daily life in 2023. From smart home devices to the latest wearables, we've got you covered with our comprehensive guide.

Current cases:
- [Q] -> [A]

Generate the most informative edge case that, when answered, will reveal the most about the desired behavior beyond what has already been queried for above. Generate the edge case in the following format, and nothing else: "Are you interested in the following article? [edge case]"
